element;intro
#Welcome;Input data, can be CSV file or RData with singleCellExperiment object.
#GeneralTour;If you click out of the intro-highlighted area, you are about to interrupt the tour. Don't worry, you can resume it anytime by re-clicking on the tour button.
#fileInput;If you click out of the intro-highlighted area, you are about to interrupt the tour. Don't worry, you can resume it anytime by re-clicking on the tour button.
#fileInputAnnotation; Annotations can be loaded here.
